name: RaceNetGlobal
description: I've created a professional new way for people to enjoy the automotive world like never before. I will take all positive feedback and comments so that I can improve the app and give users what they want as fast as possible. I created this with a goal of making users say wow! this app is too addictive i love how it works, simple but good quality and finally a way to MAKE FRIENDS and get to know automotive ENTHUSIASTS IN THE AREA and new places. Car Meets by gps / forums to fix or learn about and/ services to stop getting ripped off by outrages prices. please listen in the main events page.. there will be daily news about new cars, admin notes to what new features are coming out, and a lot of automotives to include!! CARS/BIKES/TRUCKS/WATERCRAFTS/OFFROADS/AIRCRAFT. RaceMode- appearl is available as well.
